oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:title: Grand Ole Opry - Prince Albert - 1955-07-16 - Part 1
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:description: Part 1 of Prince Albert tobacco sponsored Grand Ole Opry segment from July 16, 1955. Featuring Grant Turner (announcer), George Morgan (host/performer), guest performers Lonzo & Oscar with their Winston County Pea Pickers including Cousin Jody and Tommy Warren, and regular performers Rod Brasfield, Ray Edenton, Del Wood, Minnie Pearl, and Grandpa Jones. Held at Ryman Auditorium, Nashville, TN.
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:creator: George Morgan; Rod Brasfield; Lonzo & Oscar; Cousin Jody; Tommy Warren; Ray Edenton
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dcterms:tableOfContents: Grant Turner introduces George Morgan -- Candy Kisses (George Morgan) -- Opening statement (George Morgan, Grant Turner) -- George Morgan introduces Rod Brasfield -- Comedy routine (Rod Brasfield, George Morgan) -- Prince Albert commercial (Grant Turner, George Morgan) -- George Morgan introduces Lonzo & Oscar -- I'm Movin' On No. 2 (Lonzo & Oscar, Cousin Jody, Tommy Warren) -- George Morgan talks -- Jesus, Savior, Pilot Me (George Morgan, Ray Edenton) -- Prince Albert commercial (Grant Turner, George Morgan) -- Prince Albert jingle (George Morgan)
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:subject: WSM (Radio station : Nashville, Tenn.); National Broadcasting Company; Grand ole opry (Radio program); Ryman Auditorium (Nashville, Tenn.); Turner, Grant; Morgan, George, 1925-1975; Brasfield, Rod; Wood, Del; Jones, Grandpa, 1913-1998; Byrd, Billy; Edenton, Ray; Lonzo and Oscar; Cousin Jody; Warren, Tommy; Winston County Pea Pickers (Musical group)
